pageContext.claim: “We just got you a big pay raise. First time in 10 years. We got you a big pay increase. First time in over 10 years. I fought for you. That was the hardest one to get, but you never had a chance of losing.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump is flat wrong. According to the Department of Defense, active members of the military have received a pay increase every year since 1983.
